com.eep.taxe.models

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eep.taxe.models.Vertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VertexInterface, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Junction, Station

    public abstract class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements VertexInterface
    Represents an abstract Vertex on the map graph. This class can't be instantiated. Sub classes are Stations and Junctions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
